document_data.name: Agrivar family
document_data.mainbody: The '''Agrivars''' were a prominent noble family of [[the North]] in the 1350s [[DR]], producing the renowned [[wizard]] [[Ostus Agrivar]] and his children the famed adventurers [[Kyriani Agrivar|Kyriani]] and [[Priam Agrivar]].{{Cite comic/The Gathering|1}}{{Cite dragon/247/Rogues Gallery: Crew of the Realms Master|80}}
document_data.Base: The family seat was the [[Nasaqh Estates|Agrivar estate]] on [[Mount Sar]], east of the [[High Road]] out of [[Waterdeep]] along the [[Sword Coast North]].{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|2, 15}} Their home there was called [[Ostus's Hold]].
document_data.Crest: The family crest was a sable griffin rampant—that is, a black [[griffin]] standing with forelegs raised and facing to the left.
document_data.Members:
* [[Ostus Agrivar]], renowned wizard of the North and keeper of ''[[Selûne's Eye]]''.
* [[Kyriani Agrivar]], a heroine of [[Waterdeep]] and member of the [[Moonstars]].
* [[Priam Agrivar]], valiant [[paladin]] and a crewmember of the ''[[Realms Master]]''.
